text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after our little outing, Mayano<n>Top Gun trained to
the best of her<n>abilities, trying hard to not get too<n>bored.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Phew... that's the last one!
choice_data_list: Good work! Let's call it for now.
Good work! Let's call it for now.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm... Not yet. I can still run!<n>What's up next?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I still think training's boring, and I<n>really don't see the point
of it, but...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I told myself that I'd listen to you—that<n>I'd try really hard if
you told me to! So<n>tell me, what do I do next?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The training regimen I prepared for<n>Mayano is meant to
improve her<n>stamina. To my surprise, she really<n>listened to
all my instructions.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: This went on for a few days...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You won't believe this! C'mon,<n>follow me! This way, now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Guess what! I get to run in a<n>scrimmage!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
They told me that since I've been<n>training so hard, I can run
in a race!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, yep! All thanks to you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hey, come and watch me race, okay?I'm gonna head over first to getready, but I'll be waiting for you! Youhave to come! Promise?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I agree and promise her that I will<n>attend the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She seems all pumped up and ready<n>to go. I wonder how
she'll run today...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey Brian! Are you here to run inthe scrimmage too?! You're runningwith me?! Yesss!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What's with you? Why are you so...<n>annoying?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm just so happy! ♪ ...Oh, you<n>came!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yep! ♪ I feel on top of the world right<n>now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's hard to put into words, but I feel<n>like I'm gonna have so
much fun<n>today! I wonder why...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This will be my first time watching<n>Mayano race since she
started<n>training seriously.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A runner of pure natural talent, she<n>possesses an incredible
intuition and<n>knows how to make the best<n>decisions in a
race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now that she's combined that talent<n>with some solid
training, who knows<n>what heights she can achieve?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it looks like they're starting soon!<n>I gotta go, but don't
take your eyes<n>off me, okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race has just started, and Narita<n>Brian is already setting
the pace with<n>her commanding presence.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Partway through, in an attempt to<n>block off Narita Brian,
Mayano Top<n>Gun tries to maneuver her way in<n>front of
the experienced Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Okay, now's my chance! I gowhip here, and—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Out of my way.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh?! But I thought I got it! How<n>come that didn't work?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The tables turn, and it's Mayano Top<n>Gun who ends up
being blocked. She<n>then begins to fall behind...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As expected, Narita Brian isn't a<n>racer to be
underestimated.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That said, Mayano also isn't the type<n>to go down without a
fight.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(I have this... weird feeling. I thought I<n>got it, but it didn't
work out.)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(But... I dunno... I feel like I still get it. I<n>get it, but it's
something new that I'm<n>getting.)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
(I mean, my legs are still moving! So I<n>have to get it more! I
have to do<n>more!)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Now!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hm?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun sets her eyes on<n>Narita Brian's back, and
with a<n>sudden burst of speed, she dashes<n>ahead through
the crowd of runners.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Maya, taking off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hah... this one's good!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In the end, Mayano was unable to<n>overtake Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But her efforts are praiseworthy<n>nonetheless.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... sigh... I can't believeI lost!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but... it was amazing! I had sooo<n>much fun!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I mean, this is the first time I've ever<n>figured out something
new in the<n>middle of a race!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But I still couldn't catch up to Brian...<n>and then I noticed even
more stuff I<n>don't get.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
That made it way more exciting<n>though! It was fun before,
but it's<n>even more so now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, do you think that maybe... just<n>maybe... this is 'cause I
trained?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Training... lets me get new things.<n>That's the point, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It's boring, and I don't like it,<n>but I guess it isn't
pointless.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'll keep doing it! But only with<n>you. I'll power through
the boredom, I<n>promise!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So could you, um... y'know... could<n>you stay with me?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I'll become a twinkly grown-up racer<n>too, just you wait and
see! I wanna<n>show you before I show anybody<n>else!
choice_data_list: Of course! I'd be more than happy to help you.
Of course! I'd be more than happy to help you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Really?! Are you for real?! No<n>backsies, got it?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaay! Thanks a bunch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so begin my days training<n>Mayano Top Gun, a young
genius<n>hiding infinite potential within her<n>small frame.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Mayano Top Gun, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll remember you.
